name: Gunship Attack 2017
description: Gunship Attack 2017 is on action. The World's most modern combat helicopter are at your fingertips. You become a helicopter pilot and combat mission across all over the world. Your mission to attack on enemy camp. Enemy camp is on different island. Your helicopter is full loaded with thrilling weapon. Enemy also with their special assaulting commando squads. You have to destroy enemy camp and tower. Enemy is alert there You have to destroy enemy camp and tower. Enemy is alert there.
